siteMetadata.title: Piotr Mionskowski
siteMetadata.subtitle: Piotr Mionskowski's thoughts on software, technology, architecture, design patterns and programming in general.

node.excerpt: Last time I have outlined the importance of timeouts. Without a carefully considered timeouts our application can become unresponsive easily. In this post I will focus on configuring various timeouts related to interaction with database. I am going to focus specifically on relational databases. The principles andâ€¦
